text: Hashim Thaçi (; ; born 24 April 1968) is a Kosovar politician. He was the President of Kosovo from April 2016 until November 2020. He was the first Prime Minister of Kosovo and the Foreign Minister and Deputy Prime Minister in the new cabinet led by Isa Mustafa. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Kosovo Category:Presidents of Kosovo
title: Hashim Thaçi
